item.description:
It feels good to be fit & look great (yes?), especially with Spring & Summer around the corner & we can finally put away the winter clothes.

If you are groaning & feeling the need for deprivation, willpower & discipline to lose weight, what do you think about “allowing” easy weight loss in a way that is also lasting & fulfilling? We hope it's YES! YES! YES!

So get on the call on Monday night, from 8 pm - 9 pm.

CALL IN AT:

Telephone Bridge Number: 1-218-339-4600
Access Code: 488095#

Learn from Ann Ide ( a beloved presenter at our meetups):

- "Unattractive" myths to debunk about losing weight.

- How to let go of the guilt & self-judgments around your weight & eating habits.

- What makes the difference between easy & difficult weight loss – and it’s not about eating and exercise!

- How your mistakes are the keys to your success.

- How "Law Of Attraction" strategies for losing weight are also what will bring you
greater overall happiness and success in other areas you care about, too!

- A motivation activation (which Ann will guide you through) to get out of your current rut!

If you’re sick & tired of struggling with your weight & how it feels, AND trying to change the hard way, and YAY! ready for taking the “downstream”, easy approach to the body & you that you desire, RSVP YES!

Put an end to self-sabotage & easily become a happy, healthy, totally satisfied, naturally slender you for good!

********************************************************************

About Ann Ide:

Ann has over 30 years experience as a certified master practitioner in Neuro-linguistic Programming & Hypnotherapy, & is certified NLP Life Coach. She coaches people to move beyond struggles & mere survival, to new levels of harmony, happiness and success. With her expert questioning, inner exploration processes & personal change interventions, people can more easily create the happiness they desire.

Check this out (time sensitive):
Ann is also leading the very successful Inner Way Weight Loss Program.

As a member of our community, Ann is generously offering a 25% discount for the next program, starting April 2nd if you sign up by Wed, 3/27, midnight. Learn more here .

See you on the call on Monday! RSVP YES & the phone # will be sent on Sunday night.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Special Tele-Meetup: Use LoA to lose weight (finally) with ease
